topic: Methods for identifying and testing assumptions in renewable energy projects
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that my current assumptions may overlook diverse perspectives that could provide valuable insights. The next step is to actively seek out and engage with individuals who have different backgrounds and experiences to challenge and refine my assumptions. I will also implement a regular practice of questioning my beliefs and seeking feedback from others to continuously test and update my understanding.

metadata.trigger: What assumption am I making that might be wrong?
